content.question: The diagram above shows the progress of the chemical reaction for the synthesis of ammonia from its elements. The adsorption of the <math alttext="N 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> molecules on the surface of <math alttext="R u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Ru</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> weakens the triple bond between the two N atoms. Based on the diagram, what is the role of <math alttext="R u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Ru</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in this process?

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
